name: Overload (itch) (SmoothProcess, JafCraze)
description:
Stay alive. Collect power ups to get stronger and unlock new abilities.

Mix your abilities to get stronger effects!

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
Theme: Stronger Together

Made by:
Rui Pedro Costa [SmoothProcess]
&
Jaf "JafCraze" Craze

WASD/ZQSD | Move     
Mouse | Shoot
Shift | Dash 
E | Shield
Space | Shockwave
